metadata.title: CVE-2020-36788 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/nouveau: avoid a use-after-free when BO init failsnouveau_bo_init() is backed by ttm_bo_init() and ferries its return codeback to the caller. On failures, ttm_bo_init() invokes the provideddestructor which should de-initialize and free the memory.Thus, when nouveau_bo_init() returns an error the gem object has alreadybeen released and the memory freed by nouveau_bo_del_ttm().

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
